attributes.action: Exert pressure on Attheraces to restore its Stateside Programme to its previous format.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Attheraces stateside hasn't been the same since it took a live feed from America. The old format of a presenter and expert needs restoring so banter can be exchanged and viewers e-mails read out.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
